description: Wolf Schwarz (written with kanji 黒狼 meaning `black wolf` and pronounced as ヴォルフシュバルツ Vorufu Shubarutsu) is a clan in the full-dive VR game Shangri-La Frontier. Its ultimate goal is to find and defeat the unique monster http://anidb.net/ch135279 [Lycagon the Nightslayer].
name: Wolf Schwarz
